# vs-stg

### PyPi package for quickly updating and installing all my packages.

<br>

<br><br>
## How to install

Install `vsstg` with the following command:

```sh
pip install vsstg
```

<br>

## How to use

Install all my packages:
```sh
python -m vsstg
```

Install latest git version of all my packages:
```sh
python -m vsstg latest
```
